price: Bazarihabwamo imbuto (z’ubwoko bwose) ndetse banabonemo ibyo bashaka byose.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
